H0.text: who died in the first episode of stranger things. Will Byers

H1.text: who died in the first episode of stranger things. Barb Holland

H2.text: who died in the first episode of stranger things. Mr. Clarke

H3.text: who died in the first episode of stranger things. Benny

A4.text: The first season, set in November 1983, focuses on the investigation into the disappearance of a young boy named Will Byers while supernatural events are occurring around a town called Hawkins

A5.text: Benny Hammond is killed by Hawkins Lab personnel shortly afterwards

A6.text: Barb was taken and killed by the monster early in the season.

A7.text: Will Byers was abducted by a creature from the Upside Down in the first season.
